definitions.text: the capability of conscious choice and decision and intention; - George Meredith
examples: the exercise of their volition we construe as revolt

definitions.text: a fixed and persistent intent or purpose
examples: where there's a will there's a way

definitions.text: a legal document declaring a person's wishes regarding the disposal of their property when they die

examples: This action was willed and intended

definitions.text: leave or give by will after one's death
examples: My aunt bequeathed me all her jewelry
My grandfather left me his entire estate
